definitions.definition: At an angle from the vertical or horizontal.
definitions.example: The child listened, her head atilt.

definitions.definition: At an angle from the vertical or horizontal; at the point of falling over.
definitions.example: He wore his hat rakishly atilt.

definitions.definition: Tilting or as if tilting (charging with a lance, like a knight on horseback in a joust).
definitions.example: to run / ride atilt at someone or something
